author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3977: Clob.truncate with a value greater than the Clob length raises different exceptions in embedded and client driver.
Changed the exception thrown in the embedded driver when calling Clob.truncate with a length greater than the Clob length from XJ076 to XJ079 (see also release note).
The client and the embedded driver behavior is now consistent.

author: tellison
msg: Move URL image content handling from LUNI to AWT module.
Update manifests, tests and build script to reflect the change of packages.

author: gnodet
msg: DIRMINA-644: OSGi exported packages should contain the mina version
